product.name: iPhone XR
product.description: A12 Bionic. And a 12 MP camera with an f/1.8 wide-angle lens. iPhone XR. Comes in (PRODUCT) RED, Yellow, White, Coral, Black and Blue colors (subject to availability).

product1.name: Rubiks Connected Cube
product1.description: will teach you how to solve the notoriously challenging, incredibly interactive puzzle and have fun in the process.

product2.name: Grovemade Wood MagSafe Stand
product2.description: has impeccable craftsmanship, thanks to a stainless steel base and stand, leather and wood accents, and a natural cork base

product3.name: Blunt Metro Wind-Resistant Umbrella
product3.description: built to withstand wind gusts up to 72 mph

product4.name: Samsung Galaxy S21 5G Android Smartphone
product4.description: Samsung’s latest Galaxy S21 Android smartphone has a sleeker and more durable design with a 6.2-inch AMOLED display, upgraded hardware specs, and, best of all, a starting price tag that’s 20% lower than its predecessor’s.

product5.name: Zyllion Shiatsu Back and Neck Massager
product5.description: can be used at home or even in the car (!) and is great for the shoulders, back, calves, and more.

product6.name: Fossil Latitude HR Hybrid Smartwatch
product6.description: can effortlessly deliver notifications from your phone and keep tabs on your activities

product7.name: SanDisk iXpand Flash Drive Luxe
product7.description: make transferring images, video, and other files between Apple products and other USB-C-equipped devices insanely effortless

product8.name: Anker PowerCore III Elite Laptop Battery Pack
product8.description: can charge your laptop via a fast USB-C connector

product9.name: Amazon Echo Dot Smart Speaker
product9.description: The latest Amazon Echo Dot smart speaker has an orb-like design that’s cooler than its predecessor’s. The Alexa-powered gadget also has a stylish and understated fabric cover.
